thread.section_title: The Benjamin - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel
thread.title_full: Great hotel - Review of The Benjamin, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Katie K
title: Great hotel
text: We stayed for 4 nights with 3 young children, ages 6-9. We had 2 rooms - and there was plenty of room for all of us. The rooms are very clean, well stocked. Both rooms had a refrig and microwave. The location was great and we walked every where with no problem. The subway is very close too. Lots of places to grab a quick breakfast and lunch near by. The staff is very friendly and knowledgable.
